description: Hearts face Thistle in Viaplay Cup last 16
title: Hearts face Thistle in Viaplay Cup last 16
title_page: Hearts face Thistle in Viaplay Cup last 16 - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hearts will face Partick Thistle in the last 16 of the Viaplay Cup.
The Tynecastle side, who bypassed the group stage due to their European commitments, will have home advantage for the encounter against the second-tier club.
The tie is due to be played on the weekend of 19/20 August.
